meanings.sent1: My mom is one of the best ironers in our neighborhood.
meanings.sent2: The laundry service employs skilled ironers to press clothes.
meanings.sent3: The ironers at the dry cleaners always make my shirts look brand new.
meanings.sent4: She was like a magician, the way she transformed wrinkled clothes into perfection as an ironer.
meanings.sent5: The ironers at the hotel work tirelessly to ensure every guest's outfit is crisp and neat.

meanings.definition: A machine used for ironing clothes.
meanings.sent1: The new ironers in the laundry room are so efficient.
meanings.sent2: The steam ironers at the tailor's shop make the clothes look flawless.
meanings.sent3: I wish my ironers at home could fold the clothes too!
meanings.sent4: The ironers hummed softly as they smoothed out the wrinkles on the fabric.
meanings.sent5: The industrial ironers at the factory can press hundreds of garments in an hour.
